src/dds/peer/instance_writer_impl.hpp

00001 #ifndef AC_SIMD_DDS_INSTANCE_WRITER_IMPL_HPP
00002 #define AC_SIMD_DDS_INSTANCE_WRITER_IMPL_HPP
00003 
00004 namespace dds { 
00005   namespace peer {
00006     
00016     template <typename T>
00017     class DataInstanceWriterImpl {
00018     public:
00019       typedef typename topic_data_writer<T>::type DW;
00020     public:
00021 
00022       DataInstanceWriterImpl(boost::shared_ptr<DW> writer, const T& key)
00023         : writer_(writer),
00024           key_(key),
00025           status_(ALIVE) {
00026         handle_ = writer_->register_instance(key_);
00027       }
00028 
00029       ~DataInstanceWriterImpl() {
00030         if (status_ == ALIVE)
00031           this->unregister();
00032       }
00033 
00034     public:
00035 
00041       DDS::ReturnCode_t write(const T& data) {
00042         return writer_->write(data, handle_);
00043       }
00044 
00051       DDS::ReturnCode_t write(const T& sample, const DDS::Time_t& timestamp) {
00052         return writer_->write(sample, timestamp, handle_);
00053       }
00054 
00055       DDS::ReturnCode_t unregister() {
00056         status_ = UNREGISTERED;
00057         return writer_->unregister_instance(key_, handle_);
00058       }
00059 
00060       DDS::ReturnCode_t unregister(const DDS::Time_t& timestamp) {
00061         status_ = UNREGISTERED;
00062         return writer_->unregister_instance_w_timestamp(key_, handle_, timestamp);
00063       }
00064 
00065       DDS::ReturnCode_t dispose() {
00066         status_ = DISPOSED;
00067         return writer_->dispose(key_, handle_);
00068       }
00069 
00070       DDS::ReturnCode_t dispose(const DDS::Time_t& timestamp) {
00071         status_ = DISPOSED;
00072         return writer_->dispose_instance_w_timestamp(key_, handle_, timestamp);
00073       }
00074 
00075       DDS::ReturnCode_t
00076       wait_for_acks(const DDS::Duration_t& timeout) {
00077         return writer_->wait_for_acknowlegments(timeout);
00078       }
00079     private:
00080 
00081       enum InstanceStatus_ {
00082         ALIVE, UNREGISTERED, DISPOSED
00083       };
00084     private:
00085       boost::shared_ptr<DW> writer_;
00086       T key_;
00087       DDS::InstanceHandle_t handle_;
00088       InstanceStatus_ status_;
00089     };
00090 
00091     
00092   } 
00093 }
00094 #endif /* AC_SIMD_DDS_INSTANCE_WRITER_IMPL_HPP */
